heading: HB07949
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING A PHILIPPINE LABOR FORCE COMPETENCIES COMPETITIVENESS PROGRAM, AND ESTABLISHING FREE ACCESS TO TECHNICAL AND VOCATIONAL TRAINING PROGRAMS
status: Pending with the Committee on HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07949
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING A PHILIPPINE LABOR FORCE COMPETENCIES COMPETITIVENESS PROGRAM, AND ESTABLISHING FREE ACCESS TO TECHNICAL AND VOCATIONAL TRAINING PROGRAMS
ABSTRACT : Aims to strengthen the qualifications of Filipino workers; provides innovative education and training; facilitate and enhance access to quality technical education and training; and encourage participation of industry and communities in building competent workers.
ALIAS NAME : “Lingkod Manggagawa Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2018-09-03)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2018-08-01
